## Helicopter Charter Services for the Polar Continental Shelf Program (PCSP)
### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Reference:** #NRCan-5000078171 - 01
**Publication Date:** April 9, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 1, 2024 14:00:00 (Eastern Time Zone)

**Procurement Details:**

* **Category:** Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents for more information.

**Services Required:**

The Government of Canada, through Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), is seeking proposals from qualified bidders to provide helicopter charter services, including pilot(s), engineer(s), and maintenance services, to support the Polar Continental Shelf Program's (PCSP) operations.

**Important Dates:**

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

**Tender Documents:**

Tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments, are available on the Canadabuys website at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35659/nrcan-5000078171-01-rfp.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35659/nrcan-5000078171-01-qa-qr-1.pdf .

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Brenda Harlow at Brenda.Harlow@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca or (999) 999-9999.
